Token.Abstract: A location ordering factory provides {@link ILPOrdering orderings} that operate on {@link ILPLocation locations}.
Returns a filter that sorts locations by ascending distance from the last known geopoint of the device.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a filter that sorts locations by ascending distance from the last known geopoint of the device
